s0600.literal: Bai Qi attacked Zhao, took Daiguang Wolf city.
s0600.idiomatic: Bai Qi attacked Zhao, took Daiguang Wolf city.

s0601.chinese: 又使司馬錯發隴西，因蜀攻楚黔中，拔之。
s0601.literal: Again sent Sima Cuo to mobilize Longxi, through Shu attacked Chu's Qianzhong, captured it.
s0601.idiomatic: Again sent Sima Cuo to mobilize Longxi, through Shu attacked Chu's Qianzhong, captured it.

s0602.chinese: 二十八年，大良造白起攻楚，取鄢、鄧，赦罪人遷之。
s0602.literal: Twenty-eighth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Yan, Deng, pardoned criminals and moved them there.
s0602.idiomatic: Twenty-eighth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Yan, Deng, pardoned criminals and moved them there.

s0603.chinese: 二十九年，大良造白起攻楚，取郢為南郡，楚王走。
s0603.literal: Twenty-ninth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Ying as Nan commandery, Chu king fled.
s0603.idiomatic: Twenty-ninth year, Grand Commandant Bai Qi attacked Chu, took Ying as Nan commandery, Chu king fled.

s0605.literal: King met with Chu king at Xiangling.
s0605.idiomatic: King met with Chu king at Xiangling.

s0607.chinese: 三十年，蜀守若伐楚，取巫郡，及江南為黔中郡。
s0607.literal: Thirtieth year, Shu governor Ruo attacked Chu, took Wu commandery, and the south of Jiang as Qianzhong commandery.
s0607.idiomatic: Thirtieth year, Shu governor Ruo attacked Chu, took Wu commandery, and the south of Jiang as Qianzhong commandery.

s0608.chinese: 三十一年，白起伐魏，取兩城。
s0608.literal: Thirty-first year, Bai Qi attacked Wei, took two cities.
s0608.idiomatic: Thirty-first year, Bai Qi attacked Wei, took two cities.

s0609.literal: Chu people rebelled against our Jiangnan.
s0609.idiomatic: Chu people rebelled against our Jiangnan.

s0610.chinese: 三十二年，相穰侯攻魏，至大梁，破暴鳶，斬首四萬，鳶走，魏入三縣請和。
s0610.literal: Thirty-second year, Chancellor Lord Rang attacked Wei, reached Daxiang, defeated Bao Yuan, beheaded 40,000, Yuan fled, Wei ceded three counties to sue for peace.
s0610.idiomatic: Thirty-second year, Chancellor Lord Rang attacked Wei, reached Daxiang, defeated Bao Yuan, beheaded 40,000, Yuan fled, Wei ceded three counties to sue for peace.

s0611.chinese: 三十三年，客卿胡（傷）［陽］攻魏卷、蔡陽、長社，取之。
s0611.literal: Thirty-third year, Guest Minister Hu Yang attacked Wei's Juan, Caiyang, Changshe, took them.
s0611.idiomatic: Thirty-third year, Guest Minister Hu Yang attacked Wei's Juan, Caiyang, Changshe, took them.

s0612.chinese: 擊芒卯華陽，破之，斬首十五萬。
s0612.literal: Attacked Mang Mao at Huayang, defeated him, beheaded 150,000.
s0612.idiomatic: Attacked Mang Mao at Huayang, defeated him, beheaded 150,000.

s0613.literal: Wei ceded Nanyang to make peace.
s0613.idiomatic: Wei ceded Nanyang to make peace.

s0614.chinese: 三十四年，秦與魏、韓上庸地為一郡，南陽免臣遷居之。
s0614.literal: Thirty-fourth year, Qin with Wei, Han made Shangyong lands into one commandery, Nanyang freed servants moved to live there.
s0614.idiomatic: Thirty-fourth year, Qin with Wei, Han made Shangyong lands into one commandery, Nanyang freed servants moved to live there.

s0615.chinese: 三十五年，佐韓、魏、楚伐燕。
s0615.literal: Thirty-fifth year, assisted Han, Wei, Chu to attack Yan.
s0615.idiomatic: Thirty-fifth year, assisted Han, Wei, Chu to attack Yan.

s0617.chinese: 三十六年，客卿灶攻齊，取剛、壽，予穰侯。
s0617.literal: Thirty-sixth year, Guest Minister Zao attacked Qi, took Gang, Shou, gave to Lord Rang.
s0617.idiomatic: Thirty-sixth year, Guest Minister Zao attacked Qi, took Gang, Shou, gave to Lord Rang.

s0618.chinese: 三十八年，中更胡（傷）［陽］攻趙閼與，不能取。
s0618.literal: Thirty-eighth year, Vice Minister Hu Yang attacked Zhao's Eyu, could not take it.
s0618.idiomatic: Thirty-eighth year, Vice Minister Hu Yang attacked Zhao's Eyu, could not take it.

s0619.chinese: 四十年，悼太子死魏，歸葬芷陽。
s0619.literal: Fortieth year, Dao crown prince died in Wei, returned for burial at Zhiyang.
s0619.idiomatic: Fortieth year, Dao crown prince died in Wei, returned for burial at Zhiyang.
